text: Ezɨ Ikiavɨra Itir God ua kamaghɨn Moses mɨgei, “Kɨ ua ivezir kurar abuananam Isipian atrivim ko an gumazamizibar anɨngam. Eghtɨ ivezir kurar kam otoghtɨ, a ia amadaghtɨ ia mangam. Egh a navir amɨrizim sara ian amamatɨghan kogham. Puvatɨgham. A zuamɨra navir kuram sara nguibar kamɨn ia batueghtɨ ia bar mangam.
